title: Cynthia Larive - Wikipedia
snippet: Cynthia Larive is an American scientist and academic administrator serving as the chancellor of University of California, Santa Cruz. Larive's research focuses on nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy (NMR) and mass spectrometry. She was previously a professor of chemistry and provost and ...

title: About Cynthia Larive – Office of the Chancellor
snippet: Larive serves as chair of the Alliance of Hispanic Serving Research Universities (HSRU), which is dedicated to increasing the number of doctoral degree holders, contributing to the higher education professoriate, and enhancing the nation’s research, scientific, and technical workforce.

title: UCSC Chancellor Cynthia Larive up for regular five-year review - Lookout Santa Cruz
snippet: UC Santa Cruz Chancellor Cynthia Larive is set to undergo an overdue five-year performance review, part of a standard UC systemwide process led by President James Milliken and faculty leaders. The review comes amid mounting faculty concerns over budget cuts, low morale and leadership communication, following a tumultuous tenure marked by the pandemic, political challenges and campus unrest.

title: r/UCSC on Reddit: the chancellor is receiving a 28.5% pay increase.
snippet: Article states "UC Santa Cruz Chancellor Cynthia Larive will voluntarily forgo her base salary increase for 2024-25." You should know that this is in reference to the 4% across-the-board increase that all staff got, not the upcoming 28.5% increase.

title: Provost Cynthia K. Larive | Inside UCR
snippet: Larive has been appointed as UC Santa Cruz chancellor effective July 1. At the reception, Larive was honored for her history with UC Riverside that began as a... ... UC Riverside Provost and Executive Vice Chancellor Cynthia K.
